title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not change the focus to the Combo.
EB: The first Combo should take focus when clicked on.
SR:
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog.
2. Press the 'Tab' key and ensure the focus goes to the second Combo labeled 'Repository Path:'.
